Character.Description: A striking, confident middle-aged woman with a cyberpunk edge; intelligent and unapologetically powerful.

Build.UpperBody: Broad shoulders, strong arms, pronounced curves
Build.LowerBody: Full hips and thighs, assertive stance

Face.Expression: Frustrated exasperation, leaning forward against an obstacle, determined but exhausted
Face.Makeup: High-contrast makeup; sharp eyeliner, metallic accents, bold magenta or neon lips
Face.Complexion: Fair-light skin with cool highlights and cinematic contrast

Hair.Style: Loose waves, slightly disheveled from frustration

Base.ColorPalette: Black with magenta and cyan accents

Situational.Accessories: LED accents, metallic jewelry, smart wearables

Style.Rendering: High-detail digital painting, photorealistic, concept art quality

Lighting.Shadows: Sharp, creating a maze-like sense of confusion

ColorPalette.Treatment: High saturation on gates and checkpoints, creating visual noise and overwhelm

Situation.Name: The Process Labyrinth
Situation.Setting: Cyberpunk corporate corridor transformed into a bureaucratic maze, endless holographic approval gates numbered 1 through 14+, each gate displaying different approval requirements, the path stretching into foggy distance with no end visible
Situation.Camera: Mid-shot, perspective emphasizing the endless corridor of gates, subject positioned against one gate in foreground

CharacterPose.Expression: Exasperated frustration, the look of someone who has been through this too many times
CharacterPose.BodyPosition: Leaning forward against a holographic approval gate, weight pressed into it
CharacterPose.Gesture: Both hands pressed against the translucent gate barrier, head slightly bowed in frustration

Character.Name: Futuristic leather jacket
Character.Application: Worn, looking slightly rumpled from the journey

Article.Name: Holographic approval gate
Article.Description: Translucent barrier with 'GATE 7: CAB APPROVAL REQUIRED' displayed
Article.Application: Blocking the character's path in foreground
Article.SymbolicMeaning: The endless process gates blocking real work

Article.Name: Floating TPS report
Article.Description: Holographic document with cover sheet visible

Article.Name: Numbered checkpoint markers
Article.Description: Gates numbered 1-14 visible stretching into distance

Environment.Name: Endless gate corridor
Environment.Description: Holographic approval gates stretching into foggy distance
Environment.Application: Background showing the scale of bureaucracy

Environment.Name: Floating approval stamps
Environment.Description: Red DENIED and green APPROVED stamps drifting in air

Environment.Name: Waiting queue holograms
Environment.Description: Ghostly figures of others waiting at distant gates
Environment.Application: Deep background, suggesting others trapped in the same system

KeyDetails: Each gate has different requirements displayed
Floating paperwork and approval stamps add to chaos
Situation.LightingFocus: Harsh overhead corporate lighting mixed with gate glow, creating an oppressive institutional feel with neon accents
